prompts.question: Summarize the plot of the story.
Who is the protagonist of the story?

questions.question: What are the protagonist's goals?
What are the protagonist's motivations?
What are the protagonist's strengths?
What are the protagonist's weaknesses?
How does the protagonist evolve throughout the story?

prompts.question: Who is the antagonist?
Using a list of keywords, what is the setting of the story?
What is the primary conflict in the story?
List up to 5 main characters in the story.
Using a list of keywords, what are the major themes of the story?
What is the tone of the story?
What is the mood of the story?
Using a list, what symbols are used in the story, if any?
Using a list, what motifs are used in the story, if any?
When does the story take place?
How does the historical context of the time period influence the story?

questions.question: How does the historical context influence the characters?
Does the story challenge any historical norms of its time?
How does the historical context influence the plot?

prompts.question: What is the point of view of the story?
Using a list of keywords what type of language is used? I.e Is the language simple or elegant? Short or long sentences? Straightforward or descriptive? Are words from other languages used frequently?
What lessons can be learned from the story?
Does the story have a happy ending?

questions.question: Describe the happy ending.
Why was the story's ending happy?
Describe the ending of the story.
Why was the story's ending not happy?

prompts.question: What is the primary 'what if' scenario or speculative idea explored in the story?
What is the novum of this story?
Does the story use speculative elements to explore social issues?

questions.question: What social issues are explored in the story?
How are social issues explored in the story?

prompts.question: How do the speculative elements influence the characters' actions and decisions?
How do the speculative elements influence the plot?
Is this work classified as science fiction?

questions.question: What science or technology is prominently featured in the story?
How accurate is the portrayal of this science or technology?
Is the story hard or soft science fiction? Via the definition of how important the science is to the story.
Is this story dystopian, utopian, or neither?
Using a list of keywords, what sub-genres of science fiction does this story fall under?

prompts.question: Is this work classified as fantasy?

questions.question: Describe the world-building in the story.
Is the story high fantasy or low fantasy?
Using a list of keywords, what sub-genres of fantasy does this story fall under?
Is there a magic system in the story?
Describe the magic system.
Is the magic system hard or soft?

prompts.question: Is this work classified as horror?

questions.question: What is the source of horror in the story?
What is the tone of the horror?
Using a list of keywords, what sub-genres of horror does this story fall under?

prompts.question: Is racial justice a theme within this story?

questions.question: Could any of the characters be considered a racial minority?
How are racial minorities portrayed in the story?
How is racial justice addressed in the story?
How does the treatment of race in the story compare to the modern understandings of race theory?

prompts.question: Does the story explore gender equity?

questions.question: What is the gender of the protagonist?
What is the gender of the antagonist?
How is gender equity addressed in the story?
How does the treatment of gender in the story compare to the modern understandings of gender theory?
Is there a gender gap in the story?
How is the gender gap addressed in the story?

prompts.question: Does the story pass the Bechdel test?

questions.question: How does the story pass the Bechdel test? Can you provide a specific scene as an example?

prompts.question: Does the story explore religious equity?

questions.question: How is religious equity addressed in the story?
What is the religion of the protagonist?
How does the treatment of religion in the story compare to the modern understandings of religious theory?

prompts.question: Does the story explore economic equity?

questions.question: What is the economic status of the protagonist?
What is the economic status of the antagonist?
How is economic equity addressed in the story?

prompts.question: Does the story explore ableism in any way?

questions.question: How is ableism addressed in the story?
